item.title: Need for multifaceted approach to improve higher education enrolment: Raichur MP G. Kumar Naik
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur MP G. Kumar Naik has urged the Centre to adopt a multifaceted approach to improve higher education enrolment warning that financial incentives alone are not adequate to tackle the systemic crisis facing Indiaâ€™s universities and colleges.
In a media note released here on Wednesday (August 20, 2025), Mr. Naik pointed out that the national Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER) stands at just 24.3%, a rise of only 5% since 2014-15, as per the information provided by Union Ministry of Education. Provi...]]>
